TextView.android:text: ADDING FRIENDS * Start by clicking the Friends icon on the home page. * Press the + icon at the bottom of the Friends screen to add a friend. * Type the name of the friend you want to add and press save. * Click the invite button beside your new friends name. * Generated is a key. * Populated is the sharing screen. * Share your key with your friend via your favorite sharing app. * Accept a key by copying it from the app you received it from. * Paste it in the import screen with a long click and select import message. * Return to the Friends screen and select the verify button beside the friend you received the key from. * Confirm with your friend that your numbers match. If yes, click accept. If no, click reject. * To delete a friend select the = beside the name and swipe.
